scripts.dev: npm run ensure:env && npm run ensure:venv && concurrently --raw "npm run dev:api" --prefix "[WEB] " "npm run dev:web"
scripts.postinstall: npm run ensure:env && npm run ensure:venv
scripts.dev:desktop: cross-env BROWSER=none concurrently --raw "npm run dev" "node scripts/wait-web.js && npm --workspace apps/desktop run start"
scripts.build:desktop: npm --workspace apps/web run build && npm --workspace apps/desktop run dist
